SELECT api_id, api_name, api_path, api_type, api_method, auth_type, api_status, enabled, group_id, tenant_id, remarks, version, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM base_api_info
api_name like concat('%',#{apiName},'%')
and api_status =#{devType}
ORDER BY api_id desc
SELECT api_id, api_name, api_type FROM base_api_info where group_id = #{groupId} and api_status !='history'

SELECT ai.api_id, ai.api_name, ai.api_type FROM base_api_info ai left join base_app_api aa on ai.api_id = aa.api_id WHERE ai.enabled = '1' AND ai.api_status = 'release'
and aa.app_id = #{appId}

SELECT i.api_id, i.api_name, i.api_path, i.api_type, i.api_method, i.auth_type, i.api_status, i.enabled, i.group_id, i.tenant_id, s.sql_script, s.datasource_id, s.datasource_type, s.schema_name FROM base_api_info i LEFT JOIN base_api_sql s ON i.api_id = s.api_id WHERE i.api_id = s.api_id AND i.enabled='1' AND i.parent_id = 0 AND i.api_status ='release'
and i.api_id =#{apiId}

SELECT api_id, api_name, api_path, api_type, api_method, auth_type, api_status, enabled, group_id, tenant_id, remarks, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, version FROM base_api_info WHERE api_id =#{apiId}
SELECT api_id, api_name, api_path, api_type, api_method, auth_type, api_status, enabled, group_id, tenant_id, version FROM base_api_info where api_path =#{apiPath} and api_method =#{method}
mapper.insert: INSERT into base_api_info( api_name, api_path, api_type, api_method, auth_type, api_status, group_id, tenant_id, version, parent_id, remarks, enabled, create_by, create_time )values( #{apiName}, #{apiPath}, #{apiType}, #{apiMethod}, #{authType}, #{apiStatus}, #{groupId}, #{tenantId}, #{version}, #{parentId}, #{remarks}, #{enabled}, #{createBy}, #{createTime} )
